diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $27$ units.
The length of the line $CH$ is $7$ units.
The measure of angle $ABC$ is $135$ degrees.
Point $I$ lies on the line segment $AD$.
Point $I$ also lies on the line segment $AH$.
Point $H$ lies on the line segment $ID$.
Point $H$ also lies on the line segment $AD$.
The length of the line $BA$ is equal to the length of the line $CD$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $BC$, $CD$, and $AD$ forming quadrilateral $ABCD$.
There are lines $AI$, $IH$, and $HD$ forming triangle $AIH$.
There are lines $AH$ and $ID$ intersecting at point $I$.
There are lines $BI$ and $CH$ perpendicular to lines $IF$ and $HJ$ respectively.
